Assessment.QuestionText: Which of these statements about <font face="courier new">ToolStrip</font> control are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: A <font face="courier new">ToolStrip</font> control can host menu items, which are similar to the menu bar.
You cannot drag items from one <font face="courier new">ToolStrip</font> to another.
A <font face="courier new">ToolStrip</font> control can reorder items at runtime.

<font face="courier new">ToolStrip</font> is the base class for <font face="courier new">MenuStrip</font>, <font face="courier new">StatusStrip</font>, and <font face="courier new">ContextMenuStrip</font> classes.
A <font face="courier new">ToolStrip</font> control can create toolbars that provides a common look and feel across the forms.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(False), (B)-(False), (C)-(True), (D)-(True), and (E)-(True).
